Good Comments: Excellent subbing. Translation choices make more sense than other subs out there. Well worth the wait. Only thing that bugs me is the reversal of name order, but thats a small gripe.
Bad Comments: Really top quality editing and script. The dialogue flows beautifully, and is accurate. Only nitpick is the reversal of Japanese name order, but for such a fantastic script, I can forgive them. Well worth the extra time to download.

Good Comments: Great subtitles, explanations added, signs translated - everything is just perfect.
Open process, literate English, and a love for the series
On point, great side note details to ensure all story plots are understood. best Sub Done ever for Simoun
Perfect subtitling. A beacon to all fansub groups.
Not a single typo, not a single badly translated sentence. 10/10
Bad Comments: coss they rock!!!! (translating I mean xD)

It's very nicely done, the print is easy to read, they didn't put it to low where it would be obscured by time bar and when certain words or noises (like hmph)that could have several different meanings were used, they elaborated. Hmph became ok, I underst
Great subs, terrible video. jackoneill did a DVD version using Simoun-Fans' TV subs, i suggest getting it from bakabt.me
